6. Mila exited the front yard. (Mila is no longer in the front yard)
7. Ethan entered the den. (Mila doesn't know Ethan entered the den)

Mila knows that Ethan was in the front yard when the celery was in the bucket, but he left before she moved it to the suitcase. Since Mila doesn't know Ethan entered the den, she would think that Ethan would search for the celery in the last known location, which is the bucket.
</reasoning>
<answer>bucket</answer>
